rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm, looking good!
That smile of yours
is absolutely perfect.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0002
rows.name:
Eh?
Where did that come from?
What a creep...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0003
rows.name: Aw, that hurts.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0004
rows.name:
But I find that sharp tongue of yours
kind of adorable~

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0005
rows.name: No way...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0006
rows.name: ...Ugh.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey.
Knock it off, Sata.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0008
rows.name:
What's your problem, Benkei?
Stop ruining my sweet moment of bliss.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0009
rows.name:
There's nothing sweet about it.
She obviously can't stand you.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0010
rows.name: You just don't get it.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0011
rows.name:
She's just being shy.
That's what you call a maiden's heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0012
rows.name:
Your attitude is beyond help.
It's basically a clinical condition
at this point.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0013
rows.name:
Did you really come all the way here
just to hit on women?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0014
rows.name: Obviously. Got a problem with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0015
rows.name:
I heard this place
is popular with women.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0016
rows.name: *Siiigh...*

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0017
rows.name:
Look, this is a crucial part of
my personal development journey.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0018
rows.name:
Training?
As if you could improve yourself
by just hitting on women.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0019
rows.name: That's not it, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0020
rows.name:
Listen, a good man improves himself
through good women.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0021
rows.name:
But they were completely
ignoring you, weren't they?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0022
rows.name: Guh...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0023
rows.name:
Hey, you think I'm a good man,
don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0024
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0025
rows.name: I think you're a good man.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0026
rows.name: I don't think so.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0027
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0028
rows.name: I think you're a good man.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0029
rows.name: I don't think so, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0030
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0031
rows.name: I do think you're a good man.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0032
rows.name: I don't think so.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0033
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0034
rows.name: You're a good man.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0035
rows.name: I don't think so, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0101
rows.name: You get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0102
rows.name:
Great! Let's get married!
Our compatibility seems exceptional.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0103
rows.name: You really have no standards, do you...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0104
rows.name: That was just a joke.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0105
rows.name:
But honestly, don't you think
having a partner is crucial?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0106
rows.name:
Rex was just a salvager,
but now he's
the Driver of Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0107
rows.name:
That's an extreme example, but...
But I can't disagree with your point.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0108
rows.name: Right?!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0109
rows.name:
Besides, we Blades don't just ge
stronger by only getting along
with our Drivers.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0110
rows.name:
There must be at least some growth
that comes from interactions
with others, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0111
rows.name: I suppose so...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0112
rows.name: I'm glad you understand, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0115
rows.name: But...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0116
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0117
rows.name:
But that has nothing to do with
hitting on women, does it?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0118
rows.name: So you saw through me!?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0119
rows.name: You're completely incorrigible!!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0120
rows.name: Those two get along well.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0121
rows.name: Those two really get along well.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0122
rows.name: Those two have a good relationship.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0123
rows.name:
Those two really get along well,
don't they?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0201
rows.name: Guh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0202
rows.name: Serves you right.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0203
rows.name:
To think my trusted Driver would say
something so cruel...
My heart is completely shattered.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0204
rows.name:
In that case, Benkei,
you need to console me...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0205
rows.name: Not a chance!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0206
rows.name:
Don't say that.
You're all I have left now.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0207
rows.name: Nope! Absolutely not!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0208
rows.name: Don't be so stubborn.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0209
rows.name: I'm not being stubborn!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0210
rows.name:
I see.
You still think I'm joking, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0211
rows.name: Yeah, pretty much...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0212
rows.name:
To prove I'm serious...
I'll do anything you say.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0213
rows.name:
If you tell me not to talk
to other girls,
I'll do that...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0214
rows.name:
If you tell me to learn
to eat umeboshi,
I'll make the effort.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0215
rows.name:
Come on, tell me.
I'm serious here.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0216
rows.name:
Fine. In that case,
crush your Core Crystal right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0217
rows.name: So harsh!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0218
rows.name: You said you'd do anything, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0219
rows.name:
No... That's...
just a figure of speech...
I didn't mean...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0220
rows.name:
Oh? So you weren't
serious about me?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0221
rows.name:
Um...
I'm sorry.
I got carried away...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0222
rows.name:
So you admit you were
just fooling around...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0223
rows.name:
Then for a while
you'll be carrying everyone's luggage!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0224
rows.name:
Don't expect forgiveness
until you've learned your lesson!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0225
rows.name:
Come on, that's harsh,
Benkei~
